mopApachedsKrberosCodec <- read.csv("../results/MOP-apacheds-kerberos-codec.csv", head=T, sep=",")

mopArtemisCommons['module'] <- 'ArtemisCommons'

mopDeltaSpikeCore['module'] <- 'DeltaSpikeCore'

mopMcfCore <- read.csv("../results/MOP-mcf-core.csv", head=T, sep=",")
mopMcfCore['module'] <- 'DeltaMcfCore'

mopMeecrowaveCore <- read.csv("../results/MOP-meecrowave-core.csv", head=T, sep=",")
mopMeecrowaveCore['module'] <- 'MeecrowaveCore'

mopSparkCore <- read.csv("../results/MOP-spark-core_2.11.csv", head=T, sep=",")
mopSparkCore['module'] <- 'SparkCore'




mopApachedsKrberosCodec <- sqldf('select module, ClassName, count(*)
